title: Sans serif to pair with Cholla slab
content:
Can anyone suggest a sans to use for headlines with Cholla slab? Ideally, my client is looking for something that will be set in all lowercase (which is problematic in itself, I realize, but that's what he wants...).

Thanks for your help.

Tim
author: tflavin

comments.content:
Thanks...I considered Cholla sans but it was somehow too condensed to be set in all lowercase (that's just a gut feeling and I am new at this, so I apologize if that does not make sense).

Stainless felt better by comparison so I think I will give that one a try.

Thanks so much for your suggestions.
